Text: Steve Jobs is a cunt.  Fuck Steve Jobs.

LordGod88 
First of all he was a genius. Go f... yourself

Fuck Steve Jobs and fuck the horse he rode in on.  Fuck Apple and their shitty products.  Fuck their $29.95 adapters that the Apple minions need to buy to make the latest iteration of their shit work.  Fuck Apple, fuck Steve Jobs, and fuck the lemming-hearted hordes of drooling Apple sycophants.
